UXIN I read uxins financial statements today The company has worsened its losses over the past 3 years It seems the larger it grows the more losses it makes The biggest expenses are in marketing For most quarters revenue is barely enough to cover marketing expenses let alone other operating expenses Per guidance the company expects the absolute amount of branding expenses part of marketing to remain largely unchanged Uxin is guiding for rmb900m in revenues next ER It presently incurs about rmb680k of marketing expenses Based on these figures uxin cannot be profitable by this ER In addition renrenches CEO commented that competition is going to intensify I also found another article that states the used car industry is unlikely to be profitable httpsequaloceancomauto20190407lackofprofitabilityisacommonphenomenonintheusedcarindustry
